title: Emre Can - Wikipedia
snippet: Emre Can (Turkish pronunciation: [ˈemɾe ˈdʒan]; born 12 January 1994) is a German professional footballer who plays for Bundesliga club Borussia Dortmund, which he captains, and the Germany national team. A versatile player, he primarily plays as a central midfielder, but is also capable ...

title: Emre Can prepares his farewell to Borussia Dortmund | Fichajes.net
snippet: ▪️The three Turkish giants are preparing official bids in January for the 31‑year‑old defender. pic.twitter.com/ZdqEpJkHi2 — Ekrem KONUR (@Ekremkonur) December 7, 2025 · Within Borussia Dortmund, the renewal of the player is not ruled out, but it also does not seem to be a priority. The continuity of Emre Can depends largely on the club's sports objectives, especially regarding their qualification for European competitions.

title: Turkish clubs show interest to sign Emre Can, but Dortmund want to extend player – reports - Football | Tribuna.com

title: Emre Can - FC 26 - Dec 2, 2025 | SoFIFA
snippet: Emre Can (born 12 January 1994) is a German footballer who plays as a center back for German club Borussia Dortmund. In the game FC 26, his overall rating is 82.
